effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.

short_effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.
